name: Poultry Panic: Demo
description:
-Play as a noble chicken, and make your way out of GFC (Georgian Filleted Chicken) headquarters. However, it won't be a simple task as General Beaches has sent reinforcements to make sure he has met the fowl quota for the week.
-Dash, flap, and chuck eggs to make your escape and get your revenge on General Beaches. Let's make sure that he understands that this will be the last time he takes your feathered brethren for granted.

-This demo features 4 levels, 3 of them are already unlocked, but you'll have to explore the maps to unlock the 4th level.

-This is my first game ever published, and it's a solo project. If you encounter any bugs or have any feedback let me know. That way we can make this game the best it can be: blxcorp411@gmail.com
